name: 弗雷德里克·约里奥-居里
bio_short: 法国物理学家，他与妻子伊雷娜·约里奥-居里（居里夫人的女儿）共同发现了“人工放射性”（`joliot_curie_artificial_radioactivity_1934`），并因此获得了1935年的诺贝尔化学奖。
bio_short_en: A French physicist who, with his wife Irène Joliot-Curie (Marie Curie's daughter), jointly discovered 'artificial radioactivity' (`joliot_curie_artificial_radioactivity_1934`), for which they won the 1935 Nobel Prize in Chemistry.
